# 2.	BTracT Tool Set-up

----

<b> Requirements: </b>
+ Android phone/ tablet
+ zebra ZQ520 mobile printer

---

<b> Installation: </b> 
<br>

On your mobile phone, go to play store and download
    + ODK collect
    + ODK sensors
    + ODK Zebra Printer - Apk provided

---
